about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Kraktures! A strange world populated by monsters who use creatures called Kraktures to train and fight!

Collect, and fight using creatures known as Kraktures in this new, unknown world. You are a human sent to world known as the Great Deep and your goal is to get back home. Along the way you meet new friends, and a sinister group of villians who are up to no good.

  • Build your own unique team by picking your Kraktures' stats.

  • Select your battle style: A Turn-Based or Realtime RPG!

  • Explore up to 12 different islands with different environments and Kraktures.

  • Play the way you want with multiple different customization options to make your adventure different each time you play.

This is your adventure! Play however you want!
